title: minecraft鼠標(這應該不算mod
txt_content:
本帖最后由 21804173 于 2011-11-5 19:23 编辑 

安裝方法




Windows 7和Vista

1.解壓縮檔案

2.把東西放到C:/Windows/cursors/

3.單擊“開始”

4.搜尋"變更滑鼠指標的外觀"

5.自己選

6.按確定

WindowXP

我不會翻
原文:
Windows XP
1. extract files.
2. click start
3. click "Control Panel"
4. click "Printers and Other Hardware"
5. click "Mouse"
6. click the pointers tab
7. click browse, then locate and select the cursor file
8. click OK

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: - -这只能说是 嗯。。自定义界面之类的
